column4: apache server doesn't worked after i update 7.04 now php not working. how to fix it?
ok, so apache does not have the php module in
an earlier 7.04 package or from an earlier ubuntu release
do you see php5.load and php5.conf in thre ?
please look in /etc/apache2/mods-available for the php5 files I mentioned
you have deleted the symlinks then
you need to create a symlink from the avilable file to a file of the same name in the enabled dir
etc/apache2# ln -s mods-available/php5.conf mods-enabled/   << i did
does the files appear in mods-enabled ?
restart apache and you should be fine
